New Records: Jackson Jobe recorded his first MLB strikeout
Key Match Events: Tigers' six-game winning streak was snapped
Jackson Jobe had a 39-pitch outing, drawing 10 called strikes on fastballs, changeups, and sweepers
Pre-Game Insights: Manager A.J. Hinch emphasized the importance of getting Jackson Jobe fresh for the Wild Card Series
Post-Match Reflections: Manager A.J. Hinch praised Jackson Jobe's performance, calling it 'excellent', and noted that he was efficient and threw all of his pitches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in a 'wet and dreary' condition, with a 2-hour, 20-minute rain delay before first pitch
Others: The Tigers will have to cut down from their current 28-man roster for the AL Wild Card Series on Tuesday
